thread.title: Giants' Odell Beckham Jr. is questionable for Monday Night Football vs. Eagles | Injury report
thread.title_full: Giants' Odell Beckham Jr. is questionable for Monday Night Football vs. Eagles | Injury report

author: James Kratch | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Giants' Odell Beckham Jr. is questionable for Monday Night Football vs. Eagles | Injury report
text:
Comments 
EAST RUTHERFORD â€” The Giants have ruled wide receiver Odell Beckham Jr. questionable for Monday night's NFC East showdown against the Eagles in Philadelphia. 
Beckham still has not practiced this week due to the hamstring injury he suffered in the Giants' 30-27 win over the 49ers this past Sunday night. But coach Tom Coughlin said Beckham was "coming along" on Friday. 
The Giants had their typical recovery day on Saturday, and will have a full-speed portion of their usual day-before walkthroughs on Sunday, giving Beckham one more chance to practice before Monday. 
And even if he does not practice Sunday, Coughlin still left the door open for him to play , saying "it would be good" if Beckham practiced, but "does [not practicing] preclude [him from playing], no." 
Beckham had swelling in his hamstring, NJ Advance Media learned earlier in the week , and was optimistic he would be able to play against the Eagles to start the week. 
Here is the rest of the Giants' Saturday injury report:
